RepresentativeComplaints.Description: 2005 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE LAREDO DEATH TRAP.  1) ENGINE SHUT OFF ON DRIVEWAY  2) CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ON AND OFF IN 3 ENGINE CYCLES  3) 70 MPH ON FREEWAY. INSTRUMENT PANEL DIMMED, GAUGES WENT TO ZERO AND THE ENGINE SHUT OFF.  VEERED TO RIGHT AND APPLIED LIGH
